mapper.select: SELECT A.USED_USER AS usedUser,A.USED_DEPT AS usedDept,A.REMARK AS applyRemark,A.CREATE_USER AS applyCreateUser,A.CREATE_TIME AS applyCreateTime, F.CREATE_USER AS approveCreateUser,F.CREATE_TIME AS approveCreateTime,F.STATUS AS status,F.REMARK AS approveRemark FROM FIXED_ASSETS_APPLY A LEFT JOIN FIXED_ASSETS_APPROVAL F ON A.ORG_ID=F.ORG_ID AND A.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND A.APPLY_ID=F.APPLY_ID
